=== Current Issues ===
* ''Moderate: Sound doesn't work out of the box (see below)
* ''Moderate: WiFi doesn't work out of the box (see below)
* ''Moderate: Dual Monitor doesn't work
* ''Low: Beryl/Compiz no work, losses 3d acceleration

=== Installing Sound ===
View this guide, same card
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/LaptopTestingTeam/AcerAspire5720

=== Installing Wireless Card ===
* ''Atheros AR5007EG Wireless Network Adapter
* ''PCI ID 168C:001C
* ''Driver Atheros 5.3.0.56
* ''Ndiswrapper 1.49
* ''Blacklisted ath_pci
* ''$ ndiswrapper -i net5211.inf
* ''$ ndiswrapper -m
* ''$ modprobe ndiswrapper
* ''$ ndiswrapper -ma

* ''restart ... done !
